jointyc.analysis

Class StandardCompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • jointyc.analysis.StandardCompiler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class StandardCompiler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Defines a standard implementation of a compiler, assembling the given parser and the given interpreter. This compiler uses the standard syntax tree exploring machinery specified by SemanticAnalyzer class.
    Author:
    Salvatore Giampà
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
